long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TalkMeUp Chrome extension is the short and sweet version of our webapp. With this new tool, not only can you practice various critical business communication topics (sales, presentation, customer support etc.), but also can capture and analyze your real business performance LIVE! Start the TalkMeUp extension, speak to the camera (or just let it run on the backend during your video calls); you will get instant feedback without going through any courses. Enjoy the seamless and fully automatic TalkMeUp Chrome extension, and boost your communication skills and business performance on the go!
